tool_description: Performs calibration verification and adjustment of temperature sensors to ensure measurement accuracy.

sensor_id.description: Unique identifier for sensor to calibrate

reference_temperature.description: Known accurate reference temperature in Fahrenheit

sensor_reading.description: Current sensor reading at reference temperature

calibration_method.description: Calibration approach: ice_point, boiling_point, reference_thermometer, calibration_bath

acceptable_variance.description: Maximum acceptable deviation from reference in degrees Fahrenheit

error_messages: Invalid sensor_id: Sensor identifier must be non-empty alphanumeric string.
Temperature values out of range: Reference and sensor temperatures must be between -20째F and 212째F.
Invalid calibration_method: Must be one of [ice_point, boiling_point, reference_thermometer, calibration_bath].
Acceptable_variance out of range: Must be between 0.1째F and 10째F.
Calibration failed: Sensor deviation exceeds acceptable variance and cannot be adjusted.
Method mismatch: Selected calibration method not suitable for reference temperature provided.
usage: Provide sensor_id, reference_temperature, sensor_reading, and calibration_method. Optionally set acceptable_variance, technician_id, and calibration_certificate for full documentation.

calibration_status.description: Result of calibration: passed, adjusted, failed

deviation_amount.description: Difference between sensor and reference readings in degrees

adjustment_made.description: Correction factor applied to sensor if adjusted

next_calibration_due.description: ISO 8601 date when next calibration is required
